name: International Tax and Investment Center
goal: ITIC encourages tax, trade and investment policies that enhance economic growth in non-OECD countries by facilitating mutual understanding between business and government through the ITIC “neutral table,” where stakeholders convene to discuss academic analyses, policy studies and international best practices.
interests: Business and Industry, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation
euInitiatives: ITIC is strictly not a lobbying organization and makes no attempts to effect EU initiatives.
